title: Color
creator_credit: Sandra Ostertag, Holt, Rinehart and Winston, CBS, KOCE-TV (Television station : Huntington Beach, Calif.) and Coast Community Colleges
brief_description:
Episode number 10 of Series “The Photographic vision”.
Explores the reasons for the “colour revolution” in fine art photography which occurred in the last ten years. Kenda North demonstrates her simplified version of the dye transfer colour process and discusses the way colour affects the aesthetics, dimensionality and emotional content of a photograph.
creator_credit_for_label: Sandra Ostertag, Holt, Rinehart and Winston, CBS, KOCE-TV (Television station : Huntington Beach, Calif.) and Coast Community Colleges
